    • Method Detail

      • closestMatch

        @Nonnull
 @CheckReturnValue
public static String closestMatch(String input,
                                                              Iterable<String> validOptions)
         Returns the String in  validOptions that  input has the shortest
 levenshtein distance to.

 For example when given "stats" as input and "status", "help",
 "action" as validOptions, "status" is returned.

 Current performance characteristics:
 n = length of  input
 m = average string length of the strings in  validOptions
 s = amount of validOptions

 complexity = n * m * s = O(n^3)

 So try to limit the number of valid options...
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if validOptions is empty
        See Also:
        closestMatches(String, Iterable, int)

      • closestMatches

        @Nonnull
 @CheckReturnValue
public static List<String> closestMatches(String input,
                                                                      Iterable<String> validOptions,
                                                                      int maximumDistance)
         Returns a sorted List where the first entry is the String in  validOptions that's closest in terms of
 levenshtein distance to  input, or an empty list if no options within distance can be found.

 For example when given "stats" as input and "status", "staging",
 "stage" as validOptions, and 4 as maximumDistance, "status", "stage", "staging" is returned.

 Only values with a distance less than or equal to  maximumDistance will be included in the result.

 The returned list is modifiable.

      • indexOfNth

        public static int indexOfNth(int nth,
                             String needle,
                             String haystack)
        Finds the nth occurrence of needle in haystack
        Parameters:
        nth - how many occurrences of needle that should occur before the returned index
        needle - the string to search for
        haystack - the string to search within
        Returns:
        the starting index of the nth occurrence of needle within haystack, -1 if nth occurrences couldn't be found

      • levenshteinDistance

        public static int levenshteinDistance(String left,
                                      String right)
        Returns the levenshtein distance between left and right.
        See Also:
        closestMatch(String, Iterable)

      • levenshteinDistance

        public static int levenshteinDistance(String left,
                                      String right,
                                      int maxDistance)
        Returns the levenshtein distance between left and right. If it's greater than maxDistance, maxDistance will be returned.
        See Also:
        closestMatch(String, Iterable)

      • numberToPositionalString

        @Nonnull
 @CheckReturnValue
public static String numberToPositionalString(int number)
        Returns number expressed as a position. For example 0 returns "zeroth", 1 returns "first" and so forth up to "fifth". Higher positions are described as "6th", "7th" and so on.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if number is negative

      • pointingAtIndex

        public static String pointingAtIndex(int indexToPointAt)
        Returns a " ^" string pointing at the position indicated by indexToPointAt

      • repeat

        @Nonnull
 @CheckReturnValue
public static String repeat(String part,
                                                        int times)
        Parameters:
        part - the string to repeat
        times - how many times to repeat
        Returns:
        part, repeated times times

      • startsWithAndHasMore

        public static boolean startsWithAndHasMore(String input,
                                           String toStartWith)
        Returns true iff input starts with toStartWith and has more characters after that match
